LanguageData.MakeClothHand.label: weave five cloths
LanguageData.MakeClothHand.description: weave cloth from raw cotton. \n\nMakes 5 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeLinenHand.label: weave five linen cloths
LanguageData.MakeLinenHand.description: weave linen cloth from raw flax. \n\nMakes 5 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeHempClothHand.label: weave five hemp cloths
LanguageData.MakeHempClothHand.description: Turn smokeleaf leaves into a hemp cloth.
LanguageData.MakeCloth.label: weave cloth (20)
LanguageData.MakeCloth.description: weave cloth from raw cotton. \n\nMakes 20 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeClothBulk.label: weave cloth (100)
LanguageData.MakeClothBulk.description: weave cloth from raw cotton. \n\nMakes 100 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeLinen.label: weave linen cloths (10)
LanguageData.MakeLinen.description: weave linen cloth from raw flax. \n\nMakes 10 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeLinenBulk.label: weave linen cloth (50)
LanguageData.MakeLinenBulk.description: weave linen cloth from raw flax. \n\nMakes 50 cloth.
LanguageData.Make_PatchleatherBulk.label: make patchleather x4
LanguageData.Make_PatchleatherBulk.description: Combine various types of leather to create weak patchleather. \n\nMakes 200 Patch Leathers.
LanguageData.MakeHempCloth.label: weave hemp cloths (10)
LanguageData.MakeHempCloth.description: Turn smokeleaf leaves into a hemp cloth.

LanguageData.MakeHempClothBulk.description: Turn smokeleaf leaves into a hemp cloth. \n\nMakes 50 Cloths.
LanguageData.MakePlasteelThread.label: craft twenty-five plasteel threads
LanguageData.MakePlasteelThread.description: Spin plasteel thread from plasteel metal. Used in advanced cloth weaving. \n\n Makes 25 Threads.
LanguageData.MakeSynthreadCloth.label: weave synthread cloth (10)
LanguageData.MakeSynthreadCloth.description: weave synthread cloth from raw cotton, raw flax, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 10 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeSynthreadClothBulk.label: weave synthread cloth (40)
LanguageData.MakeSynthreadClothBulk.description: weave synthread cloth from raw cotton, raw flax, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 40 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrand.label: weave devilstrand cloths (12)
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrand.description: weave devilstrand cloth from raw devilstrand. \n\nMakes 12 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrandBulk.label: weave devilstrand cloths (60)
LanguageData.MakeDevilstrandBulk.description: weave devilstrand cloth from raw devilstrand. \n\nMakes 60 cloth.
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveCloth.label: weave hyperweave cloths (15)
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveCloth.description: weave hyperweave cloth from mixing raw cotton, raw flax, raw devilstrand, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 15 cloths.
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveClothBulk.label: weave hyperweave cloths (60)
LanguageData.MakeHyperweaveClothBulk.description: weave hyperweave cloth from mixing raw cotton, raw flax, raw devilstrand, and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 60 cloths.
LanguageData.Makeblendedwool.label: craft blended wool (20)
LanguageData.Makeblendedwool.description: Blend wools from other blends of wool. \n\nMakes 20 wool.
LanguageData.MakeblendedwoolBulk.label: craft blended wool (100)
LanguageData.MakeblendedwoolBulk.description: Blend wools from other blends of wool. \n\nMakes 100 wool.
LanguageData.Makeblendedcloth.label: weave cloth from other fabric (25)
LanguageData.Makeblendedcloth.description: Blend different fabrics into a simple cloth. \n\nMakes 25 cloth.

LanguageData.MakeblendedclothBulk.description: Blend different fabrics into a simple cloth. \n\nMakes 100 cloth.
LanguageData.SalvageApparel.label: salvage apparel
LanguageData.SalvageApparel.description: Salvage unwanted apparel into raw materials.
